title: Stereophonics - Decade In The Sun (Best Of)split tracks + covers
description:
[img]http://images.play.com/covers/6179308x.jpg[/img]

    * Decade in the Sun is the first greatest hits collection from Welsh rock outfit Stereophonics. Featuring a hand-picked selection of their best loved tracks, Decade in the Sun is a blistering compilation that showcases Stereophonics&#039; rise from humble rock beings to stadium filling greats.

      Stereophonics are one of Britain&#039;s best loved rock bands. Racking up twenty-five Top 40 hit singles over their illustrious career, Stereophonics have stood at the forefront of an ever-changing UK music scene with their catchy rock sound. With six albums to their name, including the chart-topping Performance and Cocktails and Just Enough Education to Perform, Stereophonics have produced a plethora of memorable rock tracks. Now, for the first time in the Stereophonics&#039; career, Decade in the Sun enables you to experience all of their greatest hits in one compilation.

      Including unforgettable tracks such as &#039;Mr Writer&#039;, &#039;Have a Nice Day&#039;, and the number one hit &#039;Dakota&#039;, Decade in the Sun is a must-have greatest hits collection that will re-ignite the passion within Stereophonics&#039; fans and act as a perfect introduction to those discovering the band&#039;s timeless and accomplished sound for the first time.

Track List	

 

   1. Dakota
   2. The Bartender And The Thief
   3. Just Looking
   4. Have A Nice Day
   5. Local Boy In The Photograph
   6. Maybe Tomorrow
   7. Superman
   8. I Wouldn&#039;t Believe Your Radio
   9. My Own Worst Enemy
  10. Pick A Part That&#039;s New
  11. You&#039;re My Star (Radio Edit)
  12. Mr. Writer
  13. Step On My Old Size Nines
  14. Devil
  15. It Means Nothing
  16. A Thousand Trees
  17. Vegas Two Times
  18. Traffic Remastered
  19. More Life In A Tramps Vest
  20. Handbags And Gladrags
